title: Syndra VERY buggy atm
body:
Very frustrating cursor issue with Syndra, if you cast w too quickly in succession it locks the cursor on 'skill target' until you use w again on a q sphere.

Cant use map while its locked, cant hit a and left click anything to auto.. its very disorienting. I read that the same thing is happening with Renekton on NA boards.

While im on it.. from previous patches, seems like the e stun balls going backwards has stopped, but i still see some inconsistencies where the shere flies directly through somone yet there is no CC... happens once every second game on average.. 

makers her a lot harder to play..

Thanks

replies.body:
Syndra is buggerific. Try throwing Zyra plants.
